author: fhanik
msg: Optimized sendfile a tiny bit. Instead of handing off to the poller, since we are already on a thread then try it first on, and if we are not done, then simply register with the poller

author: apetrenko
msg: Patch for HARMONY-3443 "[classlib][awt][netbeans] Container.paint() throws NPE"

author: crogers
msg: Fixed an AP processor utility routine to get an option for detecting the reconcile processing phase and updated a check() routine to only run during a build phase to avoid a perf hit in a call to PackageDeclaration.getClasses() - BEEHIVE-1176.
